'''A Day in Mondstadt''' is a [[soundtrack]] from the album ''[[The Wind and The Star Traveler]]''.

On December 19, 2021, this track was re-released in the [[Featured Original Soundtrack (2021)]], ''[[Genshin Impact]]''<!---->'s first OST album recorded with {{w|Dolby Atmos}} technology.<ref>Twitter: [https://twitter.com/genshinimpact/status/1472423184171343872 Featured Original Soundtrack Announcement]</ref>

This soundtrack is featured as a tune contained within [[Radiant Spincrystal 4]].

==Trivia==
* This soundtrack features a motif from the [[Genshin Impact Main Theme]].
* The {{w|London Philharmonic Orchestra}} can be seen performing this soundtrack in ''[https://youtu.be/NWttfnCIX5E Genshin Impact OST - Behind the Scenes with the Artists]''
* This soundtrack is featured in an arrangement titled "[[Mondstadt (Soundtrack)|Mondstadt (Full Concert Version)]]." It was performed by the [https://www.symfonieorkest.be/en/pQbzua/orkest/about-the-orchestra Flanders Symphony Orchestra] in the [[Genshin Concert|Genshin Concert 2021]] event.
